name: Vr Car

How to play:

+Rotate your head to control the car
+Avoid all vehicles and collect coins by passing other cars with coins on top


Vr Vr Vr Vr Vr Vr Vr Vr Vr Vr Vr Vr Vr Vr Vr Vr Vr Vr Vr Vr Vr

Features:

1. Includes five individual cars each with a different multiplier
{ x1 through to x5 }

2. 11 different enemies to avoid
{ Eight types of cars + two types of trucks and a special police car }

3. Increasing difficulty to game, the further you get, the harder in becomes.
{ 1,000,000s of different possibilities and difficulty increases at just the right amount to keep you interested }

4. Collectable coins
Use these coins to buy new cars to get even a better score

5. All time leaderboard
{ daily charts } { Weekly charts } { Overall charts }

6. Compatible for vr and all iOS devices

7. Endless game play to immerse yourself

8. Beautiful arcady graphics

9. Perfectly fitted sounds and music

10. Awesome animations

11. Easy to learn and easy to drive your car
